these look great with the dress .

output.sentences: She looked for her grandmother's heirloom necklace.
And laid out the jewelry she would wear on her wedding day.
As she put on the finishing touches to her makeup.
Her fiancee was eagerly waiting for the ceremony to begin.
They were finally man and wife.
